Class MancalaState.PlayerTurnStateProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.pwd.boardgame.game.mancala.MancalaState.PlayerTurnStateProperty
  • Enclosing class:
    MancalaState

    public class MancalaState.PlayerTurnStateProperty
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing whether the current slot/depot is enabled for the current player turn state. This is used for binding in JavaFX
